data.name: 2048 Royal Cards
data.detailed_description:
2048 Royal Cards is the most fun 2048 Cards solitaire. Best classic puzzle game of 2048.
2048 Royal Cards. Sounds cool?
DOWNLOAD NOW. We are sure you will enjoy a lot.
HOW TO GET POINTS?
• Sliding the cards from bottom. When two cards with the same number touch, they merge into one and get points. Start at 2 and reach 32, 128, 512, 1024 and finally 2048.
• Collect points. Sounds easy? Play it now!
2048 ROYAL CARDS IS EASY TO GET POINTS:
• Score mega points with combos
• Make a 2048 royal cards
• To collect bonus cards, like the UNDO Card, Wild card, Discard card
• Wild card can merge with any number
• Discard the card you don’t like

data.short_description: 2048 is a classic puzzle with a simple goal; reach 2048. Move your tiles across the grid and merge identical numbers into one. Plan ahead and watch out for new tiles spawning, that may prevent you from joining your numbers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
